KNN_indexer module¶

KNN_indexer.create_index(cat, data)[source]¶

Create a new index and add the data to it

Parameters:
  • cat (int) – The id of the category for which we want to retrive the collection
  • data (ndarray) – the array of vectors that are going to be indexed
Returns:

the index for the data
Return type:

index
KNN_indexer.get_index(cat, data)[source]¶

The function used to retrieve index for a category which decides if it should be loaded or created

Parameters:
  • cat (int) – The id of the category for which we want to save the index
  • data (ndarray) – the array of vectors that are going to be indexed
Returns:

the index for the data
Return type:

index
KNN_indexer.get_index_filename(cat)[source]¶

Returns the name of the index file for the specified category

Parameters:cat (int) – The id of the category for which we want to retrive the collection
Returns:the path to the index file
Return type:str
KNN_indexer.get_knn(index, vec, k)[source]¶

The function used to retrieve index for a category which decides if it should be loaded or created

Parameters:
  • index (index) – the index for the data
  • vec (ndarray) – the array for which we need to retrieve similar items
  • k (int) – the number of similar items needed
KNN_indexer.init_index_for_data(data)[source]¶

Create a new index and add the data to it

Parameters:data (ndarray) – the array of vectors that are going to be indexed
Returns:the index for the data
Return type:index
KNN_indexer.load_index(cat, data)[source]¶

Load the index to a file

Parameters:
  • cat (int) – The id of the category for which we want to save the index
  • data (ndarray) – the array of vectors that are going to be indexed
Returns:

the index for the data
Return type:

index
KNN_indexer.save_index(index, cat)[source]¶

Save the index to a file

Parameters:
  • index (index) – The index to be saved
  • cat (int) – The id of the category for which we want to save the index
